title: Can not use PROJECT DISRUPTION Skins, Mainly on Ekko
body: Ok. this afternoon I have purchased all the Project Disruption skins and legends to go with them. I main Ekko so I wanted to try the skin on him first. I went into a mach and the first thing I noticed was that I could select the Ekko skin and i did. I was loading into a mach and my card had classic Ekko on it, not Project Ekko. Now that we are at this part I wanted to state that I also could not see the new card background witch I have crafted. I would like to know if I could do anything to help fix the situation. If there is a really basic answer to the situation **please don't hate!**

replies.body:
You may have corrupt or missing files in your League directory that are preventing the client from loading the right skin. I recommend [running a full repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) of League to see if it resolves the issue.

Let me know if anything changes.

Yeah, thank you very much for the help. I did a full repair assuming that I had some corrupted files downloaded because after I did the full repair and reset my pc the Ekko skin showed up and everything worked out fine!
